H0.text: Inner core is the liquid layer of Earth that lies beneath the mantle.

H1.text: The outer core is the liquid layer of Earth that lies beneath the mantle.

H2.text: Mesosphere is the liquid layer of Earth that lies beneath the mantle.

H3.text: Asthenosphere is the liquid layer of Earth that lies beneath the mantle.

A4.text: The outer core of Earth is liquid, unlike its inner core, which is solid.
